title: One Pace
tagline: Arrival at Coral Hill! The Nosebleed and the Devastating Prediction!
summary: The mermaids of Fishman Island give The Straw Hats a warm welcome, but Sanji is struck with a sudden medical emergency! Luffy and co. take their anemic friend to the Mermaid Cafe to rest, where they are introduced to its soothsaying owner.
